TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegisteredWaitHandle extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class RegisteredWaitHandle Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class RegisteredWaitHandle sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 表示呼叫時已註冊的控制代碼。

span.span: Represents a handle that has been registered when calling .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用判斷為什麼要呼叫的回呼方法，以及如何取消註冊的工作，如果回呼就會發生等候控制代碼發出訊號。The following example shows how to use a to determine why a callback method is called, and how to unregister a task if the callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 此範例也示範如何使用方法來指定的等候控制代碼會收到信號時，執行指定的回呼方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此範例中，是回呼方法`WaitProc`，並等候控制代碼是。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 此範例會定義`TaskInfo`類別來保存執行時傳遞至回呼的資訊。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 此範例會建立`TaskInfo`物件，並將其指派一些字串資料。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 傳回的方法指派給`Handle`欄位`TaskInfo`物件，使回呼方法可以存取。The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了指定`TaskInfo`做為要傳遞至回呼方法的呼叫物件方法會指定等候工作，委派，表示`WaitProc`回呼方法一秒的逾時間隔，以及多個回呼。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 當主執行緒發出信號藉由呼叫其方法，叫用委派。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法會測試來判斷是否發生逾時。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果等候控制代碼發出訊號，因為叫用回呼`WaitProc`方法會移除註冊，停止其他回呼。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在逾時，工作會繼續等候。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法結束列印至主控台的訊息。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Unregister(class System.Threading.WaitHandle waitObject) cil managed
Public Function Unregister (waitObject As WaitHandle) As Boolean

summary.span: 取消已註冊之等候作業公布的方法。

span.span: Cancels a registered wait operation issued by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`waitObject`未指定，只有當收到訊號已成功取消註冊。If `waitObject` is specified, it is signaled only if the is successfully unregistered. 如果正在進行中的回呼方法時執行，`waitObject`回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。If a callback method is in progress when executes, `waitObject` is not signaled until the callback method completes. 特別是，如果回呼方法會執行，`waitObject`該回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。In particular, if a callback method executes , `waitObject` is not signaled until that callback method completes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來取消註冊的工作，如果回呼就會發生等候控制代碼發出訊號。The following example shows how to use the method to unregister a task if a callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 此範例也示範如何使用方法來指定的等候控制代碼會收到信號時，執行指定的回呼方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此範例中，是回呼方法`WaitProc`，並等候控制代碼是。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 此範例會定義`TaskInfo`類別來保存執行時傳遞至回呼的資訊。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 此範例會建立`TaskInfo`物件，並將其指派一些字串資料。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 傳回的方法指派給`Handle`欄位`TaskInfo`物件，使回呼方法可以存取。The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了指定`TaskInfo`做為要傳遞至回呼方法的呼叫物件方法會指定等候工作，委派，表示`WaitProc`回呼方法一秒的逾時間隔，以及多個回呼。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 當主執行緒發出信號藉由呼叫其方法，叫用委派。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法會測試來判斷是否發生逾時。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果等候控制代碼發出訊號，因為叫用回呼`WaitProc`方法會移除註冊，停止其他回呼。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在逾時，工作會繼續等候。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法結束列印至主控台的訊息。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console.
